sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`REflex can push real-time notifications to your application via HTTP POST (web-hooks), SQS, SNS or AWS Lambda.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"enable-push-messaging"}}>{`Enable push messaging`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To enable push messaging for your application, you need to let REflex know where you want to receive messages by publishing your application inbox location.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/UpdateAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/UpdateAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.ds.bhhsresource.com
x-api-key: xxxxx
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "type": "UpdateAction",
    "object": {
        "type":  "SoftwareApplication",
        "id":    "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me",
        "inbox": "https://application.example.com/inbox/"
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"change-push-configuration"}}>{`Change push configuration`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To change where your application receives notifications, post an UpdateAction to your inbox`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/UpdateAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/UpdateAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.ds.bhhsresource.com
x-api-key: xxxxx
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "type": "UpdateAction",
    "object": {
        "type":  "SoftwareApplication",
        "id":    "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me",
        "inbox": "arn:aws:lambda:{region}:{account}:function:{functionName}"
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"stop-receiving-push-messages"}}>{`Stop receiving push messages`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To disable message push to your application, update your inbox URI to null.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://schema.org/UpdateAction"}}>{`https://schema.org/UpdateAction`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.ds.bhhsresource.com
x-api-key: xxxxx
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "type": "UpdateAction",
    "object": {
        "type":  "SoftwareApplication",
        "id":    "https://application.example.com/profile/card#me",
        "inbox": null
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"receiving-updates-with-aws-services"}}>{`Receiving updates with AWS services`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To receive updates from REflex users with an AWS service, use the service ARN as your applications "inbox" target.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Note: your target service must allow write/send capability to  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="strong">{`arn:aws:iam::540541948463:role/Reflex_Message_Pusher`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-http"}}>{`POST /inbox/ HTTP/1.1
Host: application.ds.bhhsresource.com
x-api-key: xxxxx
Content-Type: application/json


{
    "type": "UpdateAction",
    "object": {
        "type":  "SoftwareApplication",
        "id":    Your application URI,
        "inbox": "arn:aws:lambda:{region}:{account}:function:{functionName}"
    }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
